wrath.util

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.util.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Standard library to easily handle common file operations.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • compressDirectory

        public static void compressDirectory(java.io.File directory,
                                     java.lang.String archiveName,
                                     int compressionLevel)
        Compresses a directory into a .zip. Currently does not support sub-directories.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to compress.
        archiveName - The desired name of the .zip file (including the .zip extension).
        compressionLevel - How compressed you would like it. Higher the number, the more CPU power it takes.

      • compressFile

        public static void compressFile(java.io.File file,
                                java.lang.String archiveName,
                                int compressionLevel)
        Compresses a single file into a ZIP archive. Makes a dedicated thread for efficiency.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to be compressed into a ZIP Format. Cannot be a directory.
        archiveName - The desired name of the .zip file (including the .zip extension).
        compressionLevel - How compressed you would like it. Higher the number, the more CPU power it takes.

      • compressFiles

        public static void compressFiles(java.io.File[] files,
                                 java.lang.String archiveName,
                                 int compressionLevel)
        Compresses numerous files into a ZIP archive. Makes a dedicated thread for efficiency.
        Parameters:
        files - List of files to be compressed. Cannot contain a directory.
        archiveName - The desired name of the .zip file (including the .zip extension).
        compressionLevel - How compressed you would like it. Higher the number, the more CPU power it takes.

      • decompressFile

        public static java.io.File[] decompressFile(java.io.File file)
        Decompresses .ZIP files. This method returns a field, therefore it cannot have a thread.
        Parameters:
        file - .zip file to decompress.
        Returns:
        List of files decompressed as a result.

      • writeStringToFile

        public static void writeStringToFile(java.io.File file,
                                     java.lang.String output)
        Convenience Method to write a single string to a file. Do not use repeatedly or to write multiple strings to a file. Instead use writeStringsToFile(File file, String[] outputs).
        Parameters:
        file - The file to write to.
        output - The string you wish to write to the file.

      • writeStringsToFile

        public static void writeStringsToFile(java.io.File file,
                                      java.lang.String[] outputs)
        Convenience Method to write numerous strings to a file. Strings will be written in order of the array. Each string is a new line.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to write to.
        outputs - The strings to write to the file.
